post.title: EPCOT Flower & Garden Festival 2026: The Ultimate Foodie Guide

image.alt_text: Hero image for EPCOT International Flower & Garden Festival 2026
image.credit: Image courtesy of Disney Experiences Press Room

post.author: Jeremy
post.summary: From plant-based poke bowls to rotating seasonal menus, here is every story worth tasting at EPCOT this year.

sections.heading: Festival Essentials
sections.content: Running from March 4 to June 1, 2026, the festival features over 20 outdoor kitchens and 75+ new menu items, focusing on garden-fresh storytelling and culinary innovation.

sections.heading: New Culinary Highlights
items: Nectar Kitchen: plant-based Poke Bowl and Coconut Panna Cotta with matcha crumb.
Lan Yuan (China): Sha Cha Beef Bao Bun.
Magnolia Terrace: Blackened Shrimp Po' Boy.
Connections Eatery: Pizza Bianca with wild mushrooms and truffle oil.
Returning Favorites: The iconic Frushi (Japan) and Frozen Desert Violet Lemonade.

sections.heading: Garden Graze Food Stroll
sections.content: A fun, gamified way to explore the festival. Purchase 5 of the 9 specific items listed in your Festival Passport to earn stamps. Once complete, redeem them at Pineapple Promenade for a festival-exclusive souvenir prize.

sections.heading: New Topiaries & Garden Narratives
items: Main Entrance: Moana, Maui, Heihei, and Pua.
Wildlife Crossing Garden: Inspired by the upcoming Disney/Pixar film 'Hoppers'.
Pluto‚Äôs Pet-Friendly Garden: Practical tips for gardening with pets.
Trendy Tropicals: A focus on modern indoor/outdoor plant aesthetics.
